column5: Just got back from white fish bay on LOTW Monday evening Had a great trip with 8 guys 3 boats. We fish Lake trout and they were cooperating. Fish were still shallow.We stay at white fish bay camp and again had a great time there with Bob and Peg. They had good news they had just sold the place and were going to start a new chapter in there life very soon. Good Luck to them!Great place to stay I'm going back soon!
One of the most beautiful views of the lake is right from their front lawn. Best of luck to them on their new journey. Who purchased the camp? Bill
from I heard?It was two guys from Missouri. One owns car dealerships and the other has roofing co.that's all I got!

I received a letter yesterday that said the camp was sold, the couple hired to help this year are now running the camp so it looks like Bob and Peg are finally retired.Anglers Pro bait store in Nestor Falls was sold - now called Bite Me Bait. It will run the same as it used to be as far as making phone calls, licenses, etc.
